amendment.description: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act from being used to reduce the number of oil and gas leases issued by the Secretary of the Interior.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
